entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
